workshoptitle: MySQL Databases: monitoring & troubleshooting using machine learning

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Getting Familiar with Log Explorer
tutorials.description: Getting familiar with OCI Logging Analytics Explorer

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Getting Familiar with Types of Logs Collected
tutorials.description: Getting familiar with the different types of logs collected and log sources used for this lab

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Explore Logs Using Cluster Visualization
tutorials.description: Analyzing and Troubleshooting the logs using 'Cluster' Visualization in Log Explorer

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Explore Logs using Link Visualization
tutorials.description: Analyzing and Troubleshooting the logs using 'Link' Visualization in Log Explorer

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create Dashboards
tutorials.description: Create the Dashboards in Logging Analytics to track all your priority activities using widgets in one place

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
